snippet.title: Valkyria Chronicles 3 - Behind the Scenes of Cardinal Borgia Escort [Extra Episode] [Reupload]
snippet.description:
Valkyria Chronicles 3
Fourth Chapter:
Behind the Scenes of Cardinal Borgia Escort
May 1935
Mission: "Calamity: Behind the scenes"
Objective: Eliminate all enemy units
Difficulty: ---
Weapon received: Horn (lance)

I really like Lydia. That's it.
